sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This filter only works on an image after it has been converted to frequency domain by a vtkImageFFT filter. A vtkImageRFFT filter can be used to convert the output back into the spatial domain. vtkImageIdealLowPass just sets a portion of the image to zero. The result is an image with a lot of ringing. Input and Output must be doubles. Dimensionality is set when the axes are set. Defaults to 2D on X and Y axes.
To create an instance of class vtkImageIdealLowPass, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkImageIdealLowPass
